entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:14 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near noon. Rain mixed with ice pellets early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the morning then steady. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
